description: Example of bad software, take a look into gnome Calc to see good one


The keys on this calculator keep changing to random letters, no longer usable.
Can't see what your inputting.
pretty great great lil calculator. Useful fundamental programs...oft overlooked but absolutely necessary still (unless you have raiinman-style math abilities)
The calculator is fine, but needs RPN to be useful for me.
summary: Needs RPN to be useful for me

description:
Works great, 
But would really like to have proper scientific calculator display. 
I.e. fractions displayed with X over Y, and option to set multi-line display so one can see a line or two back (history) or at least have the current input viewed a line above the result (see Casio fx-82ES type calculators),
IMO it needs history and fractions other then thats its fine i guess
You have to watch what your're doing and hit both clear buttons multiple times or you will surely make a mistake since it doesn't show what you're doing. Everything else works great.
Great app , but after choosing an operator unable to locate on screen which operator is going to be operated as sometime i forgot which operator i just clicked !
summary: great but can't see which operator is currently in used

description: Tha calculator is very good. It does what its supposed to do. It contains bits that is a plus for programmer
Very nice calculator app, does everything its supposed to do
Can't edit your input after you type the digits. It mimics too much a physical calculator, which is dumb. Gnome Calc is much better.

I miss very much seeing my input.

5+(6-1) clears the display each time I type something else than a cipher, making it hard to know if the typing is correct.
You do not see your input or history. Very annoying to use. Switched to Gnome Calc.

Efetr trying several others this one is the best for me. Nice clean look and it does work as it supposed to. 

Unlike many others you can use the keypad decimal , ! It has all the features most people can need with several layouts for every need. And it does calculte correctly unlike many others, example 1 - 2 x 3 is done correct as 1 - (2x3) = -5 and not 1-2 = 1 x 3 = 3  Highly recommended as the best calcultor out there!
Can not see what your inputting and don't have a history
summary: Can not see what your inputting and don't have a history

description:
My only complaint about this calculator is that the window cannot be resized.

Other than that, it's simple and easy-to-use.

It's OK.. But the SIMPLE calculator lacks any memory keys. To get those, you have to use the SCIENCE MODE which has everything but the kitchen sink. Could you add memory keys to the SIMPLE skin? Also a history would be nice. I am always sad when *Microsoft* can make a nicer basic calculator than KDE. That's a disgrace. I have switched to the GALCULATOR. It can even do RPN if you want it. Simple. Sweet.
KCalc is amazing. It has all the features of a fully functional calculator. Most of the calculators only offer basic functionality but KCalc. Love it!
Simple calculator. The Ui looks a bit datated. But the reason why I don't use it is because is impossible to wite the calculation all in a single line, like all the modern scientific calculators

Great app
FYI Ctrl+H shows history ;)

Hi, I am as wonderful as this calc.
Late was the night when i found out about this. I swear I almost cried. It was amazing. You ought to download it, my maid said as I was struggling with a very big leg of lamb in my mouth (it was very big).
Well, she was right. I owe her. Now I'm her maid. 

To sum up, wonderful app.
der kann ja nicht mal ne wurzel ziehen?!?!?!?!

Im Wissenschaftmodus (> Einstellung -> Wissenschaftsmodus) kann mit "Shift" zwischen Funktionen umgeschaltet werden (Modul->Wurzel; Log -> Exponential; Trigometische Funktionen und Umkehrfunktionen). Es ist somit eindeutig möglich eine Wurzel zu ziehen. 
Fortgeschrittene Methoden (Infinitesimal etc. oder fortgeschrittene statistische Funktionen) werden nicht unterstützt. Für normale Berechnungen absolut ausreichend.

Doch ! Doch !
Kann prima Wurzeln ziehen.
KCalc rechnet Punkt vor Strich und kann auch Wurzel ziehen! Durch Klicken auf die Taste "Shift" wird die zweite Tastenbelegung aktiviert und es erscheint das Symbol für Wurzel ziehen!

La aplicación funciona a la perfección. Además, es una calculadora muy completa. Se puede utilizar indistintamente con el teclado o con el ratón, cosa que muchas aplicaciones te permiten, pero aún así existen algunas otras que no, por lo que está bien comentarlo.
la verdad que la uso mucho es una buena herramienta

Excelente calculadora, me gusta mucho,
podrian añadie el hostorial de operaciones? es lo unico que le falta

Avec la possibilité d'agrandir la fenêtre principale, le produit eut-été parfait.
Dommage, elle était pourtant prometeuse.
не считает проценты, древний калкулятор
Всё необходимое под рукой,удобныйи к тому же настраемый вид
не удобно, надо что бы ответ отображался сразу как только начинаешь вводить цифры
побитовые операции сдвига влева/вправо выполняются по неизвестной науке логике

посмотрите на колькулятор Гном, найдите отличия и подумайте, так ли эти отличия несущественны. Мне не хватает ленты вычислений, и хорошо бы она не терялась при закрытии. Ну и внешний вид тоже не очень.
well,i can do anything in it
功能特别完善的计算器，该有的的功能都有了
这是linux最好计算器，ubuntu自带的那个是垃圾
